topic.title: KRS One - New World Order - Agenda

25_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGNRLFcE.body: Are we expected to allow scripts from a 3d party site, kittyseedbox, in order to use the site? -_____-
I sat here 5min, still won't load (firefox standard)

> [kopyjane](#comment_11_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGNRLFcE): Just use the Alternate Player in a separate tab if for whatever reason it won't load. Instant.io is a torrent client. The player on this site is also technically just a torrent client, except it only works on Firefox because it's loaded within an iFrame.
> Of course, if that won't work either, then there's gotta be something in your browser settings that's blocking the requests. I'd need more info e.g. Operating system, Browser version, are you behind a firewall on a college campus, etc. in order to work on a fix, that is .. assuming that we're talking about a bug, and not just user-specific settings.

That prompted me to download the torrent. The problem was that I needed webtorrent installed, after that, vids load fine. Please clarify to users that it is required, try to find a way to make it work w/o requiring them to install sftwre as well.
